explains: adj. 教区的；狭小的；地方范围的

sentences.en: She was a secretary on the local parochial church council.
sentences.cn: 她是当地教区教堂理事会的秘书。

sentences.en: My kids will probably go to parochial schools.
sentences.cn: 我的孩子们将来可能会上教区学校。

sentences.en: Their children attend a Jewish parochial school.
sentences.cn: 他们的孩子在一所犹太教区学校上学。
